title: Executive Order 6043-Amendment of Civil Service Rule IX
content: Civil Service Rule IX, section 1 (b), is hereby amended to read as follows:
(b) A former classified employee entitled to military preference in appointment may be reinstated without time limit.
The object and result of this amendment is to make the military-preference benefits uniform.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 6043-Amendment of Civil Service Rule IX Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361593
